vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.16;
son of: Jehallelel (H3094);
brother of: Ziph (H2128J), Tiria (H8493) and Asarel (H0840)
§ Ziphah = "battlement"
a son of Jehaleleel, a descendant of Judah, and brother of Ziph
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Jahaleel; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西法 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "城垛"
猶大後裔耶哈利勒的兒子, 西弗的兄弟(代上 4:16)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西法 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "城垛"
犹大后裔耶哈利勒的儿子, 西弗的兄弟(代上 4:16)
